snippet: The government is eager to regain control of the city of Idlib after forcing rebels from a neighborhood in the nearby city of Homs, Syrian opposition activists said.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut and Rick Gladstone from New York. Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad and Hala Droubi from Beirut and Andrew E. Kramer from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The government is eager to regain control of the city of Idlib after forcing rebels from a neighborhood in the nearby city of Homs, Syrian opposition activists said.

headline.seo: Syrian Forces Press Assault on Northern City
headline.main: Syria Expands Assault, Hitting Rebel Enclaves in City in North
headline.print_headline: Syria Steps Up Drive Against Insurgents, Invading Enclaves in Northern City

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
